traits.name: Mage Slaying
entries: When Valygar deals damage to a creature that is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its {@status concentration}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Valygar makes two katana attacks and one hand crossbow attack or two hand crossbow attacks.

actions.name: Katana
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
